snippet: Pacific Hydro, which has electric and wind facilities in Australia, Brazil and Chile, is being purchased from the Australian pension fund IFM Investors for an undisclosed price.
lead_paragraph: Pacific Hydro, which has electric and wind facilities in Australia, Brazil and Chile, is being purchased from the Australian pension fund IFM Investors for an undisclosed price.

headline.main: China’s State Power Investment Corporation to Buy Renewable Energy Company
